verses.kjv: Arise, shine; for thy light is come, and the glory of the LORD is risen upon thee.
verses.web: “Arise, shine; for your light has come, and LORD’s glory has risen on you.
verses.ct: Get up and shine, because your light has arrived! The glory of the LORD has risen over you like the dawn.

verses.kjv: For, behold, the darkness shall cover the earth, and gross darkness the people: but the LORD shall arise upon thee, and his glory shall be seen upon thee.
verses.web: For, behold, darkness will cover the earth, and thick darkness the peoples; but LORD will arise on you, and his glory shall be seen on you.
verses.ct: Look — darkness will blanket the earth, and deep darkness will cover the nations. But the LORD will rise over you, and his glory will be visible upon you.

verses.kjv: And the Gentiles shall come to thy light, and kings to the brightness of thy rising.
verses.web: Nations will come to your light, and kings to the brightness of your rising.
verses.ct: Nations will be drawn to your light, and kings will come to the brightness of your dawn.

verses.kjv: Lift up thine eyes round about, and see: all they gather themselves together, they come to thee: thy sons shall come from far, and thy daughters shall be nursed at thy side.
verses.web: “Lift up your eyes all around, and see: they all gather themselves together. They come to you. Your sons will come from far away, and your daughters will be carried in arms.
verses.ct: Look around in every direction and see — they're all gathering together, coming to you. Your sons will arrive from distant lands, and your daughters will be carried in loving arms.

verses.kjv: Then thou shalt see, and flow together, and thine heart shall fear, and be enlarged; because the abundance of the sea shall be converted unto thee, the forces of the Gentiles shall come unto thee.
verses.web: Then you shall see and be radiant, and your heart will thrill and be enlarged; because the abundance of the sea will be turned to you. The wealth of the nations will come to you.
verses.ct: When you see this, your face will glow with joy, and your heart will pound with excitement and swell with pride. The wealth of the seas will pour into you, and the riches of the nations will flow your way.

verses.kjv: The multitude of camels shall cover thee, the dromedaries of Midian and Ephah; all they from Sheba shall come: they shall bring gold and incense; and they shall shew forth the praises of the LORD.
verses.web: A multitude of camels will cover you, the dromedaries of Midian and Ephah. All from Sheba will come. They will bring gold and frankincense, and will proclaim the praises of LORD.
verses.ct: Massive caravans of camels will fill your land — young camels from Midian and Ephah. Everyone from Sheba will come, bringing gold and frankincense, and they will proclaim the praises of the LORD.

verses.kjv: All the flocks of Kedar shall be gathered together unto thee, the rams of Nebaioth shall minister unto thee: they shall come up with acceptance on mine altar, and I will glorify the house of my glory.
verses.web: All the flocks of Kedar will be gathered together to you. The rams of Nebaioth will serve you. They will be accepted as offerings on my altar; and I will beautify my glorious house.
verses.ct: All the flocks of Kedar will be gathered for you, and the rams of Nebaioth will serve your needs. They will be accepted as offerings on my altar, and I will fill my glorious temple with even greater glory.

verses.kjv: Who are these that fly as a cloud, and as the doves to their windows?
verses.web: “Who are these who fly as a cloud, and as the doves to their windows?
verses.ct: Who are these streaming in like clouds across the sky, like doves flying home to their nests?

verses.kjv: Surely the isles shall wait for me, and the ships of Tarshish first, to bring thy sons from far, their silver and their gold with them, unto the name of the LORD thy God, and to the Holy One of Israel, because he hath glorified thee.
verses.web: Surely the islands will wait for me, and the ships of Tarshish first, to bring your sons from far, their silver and their gold with them, for the name of LORD your God, and for the Holy One of Israel, because he has glorified you.
verses.ct: The distant coastlands are looking to me, with the ships of Tarshish leading the way, to bring your sons home from far away — along with their silver and gold — all for the name of the LORD your God, the Holy One of Israel, because he has honored you with glory.

verses.kjv: And the sons of strangers shall build up thy walls, and their kings shall minister unto thee: for in my wrath I smote thee, but in my favour have I had mercy on thee.
verses.web: “Foreigners will build up your walls, and their kings will serve you: for in my wrath I struck you, but in my favor I have had mercy on you.
verses.ct: Foreigners will rebuild your walls, and their kings will serve you. Though I struck you in my anger, I have now shown you mercy because of my favor.

verses.kjv: Therefore thy gates shall be open continually; they shall not be shut day nor night; that men may bring unto thee the forces of the Gentiles, and that their kings may be brought.
verses.web: Your gates also shall be open continually; they shall not be shut day nor night, that men may bring to you the wealth of the nations, and their kings led captive.
verses.ct: Your gates will stay open all the time — they won't be shut day or night — so that the wealth of the nations can be brought to you, with their kings led in procession.

verses.kjv: For the nation and kingdom that will not serve thee shall perish; yea, those nations shall be utterly wasted.
verses.web: For that nation and kingdom that will not serve you shall perish; yes, those nations shall be utterly wasted.
verses.ct: Any nation or kingdom that refuses to serve you will be destroyed — those nations will be completely wiped out.

verses.kjv: The glory of Lebanon shall come unto thee, the fir tree, the pine tree, and the box together, to beautify the place of my sanctuary; and I will make the place of my feet glorious.
verses.web: “The glory of Lebanon shall come to you, the cypress tree, the pine, and the box tree together, to beautify the place of my sanctuary; and I will make the place of my feet glorious.
verses.ct: The finest trees of Lebanon will come to you — the cypress, the pine, and the box tree together — to beautify the place of my sanctuary. I will make the place where my feet rest magnificent.

verses.kjv: The sons also of them that afflicted thee shall come bending unto thee; and all they that despised thee shall bow themselves down at the soles of thy feet; and they shall call thee, The city of the LORD, The Zion of the Holy One of Israel.
verses.web: The sons of those who afflicted you will come bowing to you; and all those who despised you will bow themselves down at the soles of your feet. They will call you LORD’s City, the Zion of the Holy One of Israel.
verses.ct: The descendants of those who oppressed you will come and bow before you. Everyone who once looked down on you will fall at your feet. They will call you 'The City of the LORD,' 'The Zion of the Holy One of Israel.'

verses.kjv: Whereas thou hast been forsaken and hated, so that no man went through thee, I will make thee an eternal excellency, a joy of many generations.
verses.web: “Whereas you have been forsaken and hated, so that no one passed through you, I will make you an eternal excellency, a joy of many generations.
verses.ct: You were once abandoned and despised, a place no one would even pass through. But I will transform you into something magnificent forever — a source of joy for generation after generation.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt also suck the milk of the Gentiles, and shalt suck the breast of kings: and thou shalt know that I the LORD am thy Saviour and thy Redeemer, the mighty One of Jacob.
verses.web: You will also drink the milk of the nations, and will nurse from royal breasts. Then you will know that I, LORD, am your Savior, your Redeemer, the Mighty One of Jacob.
verses.ct: You will drink the milk of nations and be nourished by the wealth of kings. Then you will know that I, the LORD, am your Savior and your Redeemer — the Mighty One of Jacob.

verses.kjv: For brass I will bring gold, and for iron I will bring silver, and for wood brass, and for stones iron: I will also make thy officers peace, and thine exactors righteousness.
verses.web: For bronze I will bring gold; for iron I will bring silver; for wood, bronze, and for stones, iron. I will also make peace your governor, and righteousness your ruler.
verses.ct: Instead of bronze, I will bring you gold. Instead of iron, silver. Instead of wood, bronze. Instead of stones, iron. I will make peace your governor and righteousness your ruler.

verses.kjv: Violence shall no more be heard in thy land, wasting nor destruction within thy borders; but thou shalt call thy walls Salvation, and thy gates Praise.
verses.web: Violence shall no more be heard in your land, nor desolation or destruction within your borders; but you will call your walls Salvation, and your gates Praise.
verses.ct: No one will hear of violence in your land anymore — no ruin or destruction within your borders. You will name your walls 'Salvation' and your gates 'Praise.'

verses.kjv: The sun shall be no more thy light by day; neither for brightness shall the moon give light unto thee: but the LORD shall be unto thee an everlasting light, and thy God thy glory.
verses.web: The sun will be no more your light by day; nor will the brightness of the moon give light to you, but LORD will be your everlasting light, and your God will be your glory.
verses.ct: The sun will no longer be your light during the day, and the moon will no longer shine for you at night. Instead, the LORD will be your everlasting light, and your God will be your glory.

verses.kjv: Thy sun shall no more go down; neither shall thy moon withdraw itself: for the LORD shall be thine everlasting light, and the days of thy mourning shall be ended.
verses.web: Your sun will not go down any more, nor will your moon withdraw itself; for LORD will be your everlasting light, and the days of your mourning will end.
verses.ct: Your sun will never set again, and your moon will never fade away. The LORD will be your everlasting light, and your days of mourning will be over.

verses.kjv: Thy people also shall be all righteous: they shall inherit the land for ever, the branch of my planting, the work of my hands, that I may be glorified.
verses.web: Then your people will all be righteous. They will inherit the land forever, the branch of my planting, the work of my hands, that I may be glorified.
verses.ct: Your people will all be righteous, and they will possess the land forever. They are the branch I planted, the work of my own hands, created so that I may be glorified.

verses.kjv: A little one shall become a thousand, and a small one a strong nation: I the LORD will hasten it in his time.
verses.web: The little one will become a thousand, and the small one a strong nation. I, LORD, will do this quickly in its time.”
verses.ct: The smallest family will become a thousand, and the tiniest group will become a mighty nation. I, the LORD, will make it happen swiftly when the time is right.
